description: The /b/Supercritcal Phase Shifter/b/ (SPS) allows for the shifting of /b/Polonium/b/ into /d/Antimatter/d/.

/d/Antimatter/d/ is the most powerful material. The collison of regular matter and /d/Antimatter/d/ can generate tons of power, and do things that shouldn't be possible. Mass produce this and you can do anything.
The Supercritical Phase Shifter is constructed with 6 faces as such:
Each side follows this blueprint, creating a /b/rounded cube/b/ with air in the corners.
Due to the incredibly high price of /b/SPS casing/b/, it is recomended to use /6/Reactor Glass on the faces when possible/6/.

Inside, /b/Supercharged Coils/b/ pointed at the center produce /d/Antimatter/d/. /b/Multiple SPS ports/b/ are required to input /6/enough energy/6/, and to input/export /b/Polonium/b/ and /d/Antimatter/d/.
